faq_page.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_page.payment_q: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_page.payment_a: We accept a wide variety of payment methods, including credit and debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and other digital payment platforms. All transactions are 100% secure.
faq_page.shipping_q: How long does it take for my order to arrive?
faq_page.shipping_a: Standard delivery time is 3-5 business days. We also offer express shipping (1-2 business days) for an additional fee.
faq_page.returns_a: We offer a 30-day return policy. If you are not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund or exchange. The product must be in its original condition.
faq_page.account_q: Do I need an account to make a purchase?
faq_page.account_a: No, you can check out as a guest. However, an account offers advantages like a faster checkout process and access to your order history.
faq_page.international_a: Currently, we focus on the domestic market, but we plan to expand. Subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to know!
faq_page.damaged_q: My product arrived damaged, what should I do?
faq_page.damaged_a: We are sorry to hear that. Please contact customer support with your order number and photos of the damaged product so we can assist you.

shipping_policy.title: Shipping and Returns
shipping_policy.subtitle: Everything you need to know about how we get our products to your door.

standard.title: Standard National Shipping
standard.description: Our standard shipping is free for all orders over $50. For orders under that, there is a flat rate of $5.
standard.tracking: All packages are sent with a tracking number that you will receive by email as soon as the order is dispatched.

express.title: Express Shipping
express.description: Need your order urgently? We offer an express shipping service for an additional cost of $15.

timeframe.title: Timeframe for Returns
timeframe.description: We accept returns up to 30 days after the delivery date.

item_condition.title: Item Condition
item_condition.description: For a return to be accepted, the product must be in its original packaging, unused, and in the same condition you received it.

process.title: Return Process
process.description: To initiate a return, please contact our support team through the contact page with your order number. We will provide you with the instructions and the return shipping address.

international.title: International Shipping
international.body: At this time, we only ship within the country. We are working to expand our shipping to other countries in the future. Subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to know about our international expansion!

damaged_items.title: Damaged or Defective Items
damaged_items.body: If you receive a damaged or defective item, please contact us immediately through our contact page. Be sure to include your order number and a photo of the item. We will arrange for a replacement or a full refund at no additional cost.

refund_policy.title: Refund Policy
refund_policy.subtitle: Our commitment to ensuring you are satisfied with your purchase.

general.title: General Policy
general.timeframe: Our refund policy is valid for 30 days from the date of purchase. If more than 30 days have passed, unfortunately, we cannot offer a refund or exchange.
general.conditions: To be eligible for a refund, the item must be unused, in the same condition that you received it, and in its original packaging.

process.title: Refund Process
process.initiate: To initiate a return, please contact us through our contact page with your order number and the reason for the return. We will provide you with detailed instructions.
process.shipping: You will be responsible for paying the shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable.

non_refundable.title: Non-Refundable Items
non_refundable.items: Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases. Additionally, gift cards and downloadable software products are non-refundable.

late_refunds.title: Late or Missing Refunds
late_refunds.check_account: If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.
late_refunds.contact_card: Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.
late_refunds.contact_us: If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to ElectronicaNr. Your privacy is of the utmost importance to us. This Privacy Policy outlines what personal data we collect, how we use it, how we share it, and your rights regarding your data.

data_we_collect.title: 2. Data We Collect
data_we_collect.intro: We collect information in several ways when you use our services:
points: Information you provide directly: This includes the information you provide when creating an account, placing an order, or contacting us, such as your name, email address, shipping address, and phone number.
Information collected automatically: We collect information about your device and your use of our website, such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and the date and time of your visit.
Cookies and similar technologies: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content.

how_we_use_your_information.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
how_we_use_your_information.intro: We use the information we collect to:
points: Improve and personalize our services and your shopping experience.
Communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries and sending you information about your order.
For marketing purposes (with your consent), such as sending you offers and promotions.
Ensure the security of our website and prevent fraud.

how_we_share_your_information.title: 4. How We Share Your Information
how_we_share_your_information.intro: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with:
points: Service providers who help us operate our business (e.g., payment processors and shipping companies).
Legal authorities, if required by law or to protect our rights.

your_rights.title: 5. Your Rights
your_rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also object to the processing of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us through our contact page.

changes_to_this_policy.title: 6. Changes to this Policy
changes_to_this_policy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

apple_app_store_disclosure.title: 7. Apple App Store Data Disclosure
apple_app_store_disclosure.content: For users who have downloaded our application from the Apple App Store, we provide specific disclosures about our data handling practices. Apple requires that developers be transparent about how third-party services, such as Firebase, collect and use data. As developers, we are responsible for ensuring that the information provided in the App Store's privacy section is accurate and up-to-date. You can find detailed information about the data our app collects on our App-Store product page.
